replies.msg:
In any point in life, do you practice the principle of Sun Tzu: 'Strike weakness, Avoid Strength'? ( Talk is cheap)

What can you learn from Bruce Lee?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cJMwBwFj5nQ

Empty your mind first

Then BE WATER.


Wherever you go, whatever you do in life, ask:
1. Where and what are strength and weakness for you and other parties?
2. Why will you do the opposite sometimes in your life? Strike strength and avoid weakness? Do you do it since you are driven by emotions such as excitement or hatred? Do you simply fall into habit of fighting?
3. STOP and quit the event immediately but orderly if you are wrong on timing, locatio, tactics, etc..

Meditate and learn from Bruce Lee:

Be Water !!
